channel.title: A little Favor :D
channel.description:
Dose Anyone Have A CSS Format For Like My space Of The Website Or Forum Background I Wanna Get The Word Out Of This Mod Kinda Like I Did For The 10th Year Anniversary Of Half-Life It Is Still Up On My Myspace Anyone Able To Help Meh With That That Would Be Uber Uber Leet :smiley: :smiley: :smiley: :smiley: !!!!
I have The Teaser Trailer The Real Trailer BMS: Bloopers *I Really Loved That One Lol* And A Fan Made Leak Youtube Vid :smiley: :3
Was Just Pondering :smiley:
(I Also Have The Website And The Steam Group On My Steam So Psyched For This Mod Its Driving Me Nuts)
(The Youtube One Is Nice To Diggin The Zombiehz):3:3

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
@OP: CSS Files Aren’t That Hard To Write For Oneself. One Need Only Take An Existing CSS File From The Destination Website, And Modify The Colours Or Filenames To Suit One’s Fancy. Background Images Will Still Need To Be Uploaded Elsewhere, And I’m Guessing MySpace Should Provide That Option.

raw_bean:

Ram only made him a mod for shits and giggles and to prompt reactions out of people. Kaze was as confused as anyone.

I haven’t seen much of it but I think he did a stellar job, eventually taking the position with the responsibility it demands, and making purple cool again.

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
I think I saw mention of that somewhere, but I didn’t have the whole story. I missed the whole fiasco, but I’ve been hearing mentioning of it for a while now.
I’m not sure who was brought up, but I can’t think of a lot of forum members who seem mod material. Wasabi I guess, I’d say Geekofalltrades, but he isn’t around much anymore. TheeGoatPig possibly…I dunno. It’d have to be someone who has a level head to put up with all the crap around here, and who has been around long enough to know what is going on. It’s a short list.
OH, and they would also actually have to WANT that kinda crappy job too. Haha. Have to be cordial and responsible on an online forum? Nuts to that! JK

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
raw_bean:

There might have been a few things said via more ephemeral lines of communication like Steam chat or MSN Messenger, but nothing springs to mind except me and brokenfridgehinge discussing who’d make a good mod, and no-one who’s posted in this thread yet was on our list, and I’m not going to say who we considered.

Sorry for everyone’s ego, but we have to deal with all your shitty posts, the last thing we want to do afterwards is discuss you amongst ourselves.

I take it Kaze mod powers didn’t work out so well? It was an awful short stint.
ALSO! Are trying to tell me that I’m not kept in your heart and mind throughout your day to day life? I’m…so…so…hurt.

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Nothing at all in recent memory. Ok, ok, before this gets out of hand, let me go check the mod forums.

…

The only members we’ve ever discussed in there since the most recent forum crash are:

  • the guy who pretended to be Kalashnikov
  • some troll who I now don’t remember very well who kept signing up new trolling accounts under different IPs (I think ‘fuck’ and ‘bored’ were him)
  • Neskwik/Failcrash (and only right at the start, where I asked Ram to remove his signature privileges after he kept ignoring me telling him to get a smaller sig)
  • Hot#s
  • and Kaze and the guy he banned during his brief mod stint.

There might have been a few things said via more ephemeral lines of communication like Steam chat or MSN Messenger, but nothing springs to mind except me and brokenfridgehinge discussing who’d make a good mod, and no-one who’s posted in this thread yet was on our list, and I’m not going to say who we considered.

Sorry for everyone’s ego, but we have to deal with all your shitty posts, the last thing we want to do afterwards is discuss you amongst ourselves.

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Admitting it is the first step on the road to recovery.
I’m not actually an asshole. I talk the way I type but people take me too serious at times…because it reads serious. But it is never intended to be. It’s just my way. There isn’t one person on these forums I wouldn’t go out of my way to assist in technical stuff ( which is about all I’m good for )

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Collision:

Tbh, I’m yet to see proof of that.

Present me some proof of the opposite and I’ll do something about it. As in, if you have a problem with specific posts or members, use the report function or PM a moderator with your concerns. If you’re just upseet because you miss Hot#s, suck it up.

Imonfire:

So, you think he banned him because he just didn’t like him?

It wasn’t me that banned him anyway, although Ram asked for input from the whole mod team before he did it and none of us cared to argue for his remaining here.

wheybags:

…Kaze?

I very nearly did ban him when he was at his worst. He’s been fairly restrained for some time though.

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
raw_bean:

Because most of those people are perfectly sane and rational and non-flaming when they don’t have Hot#s provoking them. Rest assured if anyone gets into arguments over nothing as consistently as he did they’ll probably go the same way.

…Kaze?

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Right4Dead:

It reads like you’re gasping for air between every sentence.

It Does Doesn’t It!!

If it doesn’t, it actually means you have reading problems.

AND IF YOU DON’T READ THIS AS IF I’M SHOUTING THEN YOU ALSO HAVE READING PROBLEMS.

READING PROBLEMS AND PERCEPTION PROBLEMS.[/SIZE] :fffuuu::retard:

Christ, did anyone actually make full sense of what the original poster was asking? I can’t even assemble it.

Read full topic

item.title: A little Favor :D
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Okay with or upset about the banning, it shouldn’t really matter. It’s a ways back now, and it’s not going to change anything now is it?
I never really paid too much attention to hot#s, because the topic of his threads were a little inane to me, but if he was banned then he was banned. That’s just how it goes. We are all just guests here, and fighting about stuff we don’t really have the right to isn’t going to change things is it now?
Sorry, don’t mean to sound preachy, but how about we let it go?

Read full topic
